MS MCQs

    Configure enterprise-grade compliance in Microsoft Teams

    »

    1. By default, how long is data retained in Teams chat and channels?

      The period specified in the Teams admin center org settings

      Indefinitely

      Five years


    2. How can you create a new information barrier policy using PowerShell?

      New-OrganizationSegment

      New-InformationBarrierPolicy

      Set-InformationBarrierPolicy


    3. What is required to create a communication compliance policy?

      Enable the audit log

      Create a Communication Compliance Analysis role

      Set up groups for communication compliance


    4. How can you export eDiscovery search results?

      From the eDiscovery case Export tab

      Select Export from the Microsoft 365 Compliance center menu

      From the eDiscovery case Searches tab
